title: Bug 109718 - Tips in text item show content in one line when large content is added
description:
INTRODUCTION 32. SOME OF THE ERROR MESSAGE DOESN'T HAVE ENOUGH INFORMATION FOR THE USER TO IDENTIFY THE ERROR. 42.5 ADD JAVASCRIPT OBJECT 42.6 SUPPORT DROP IN THE GROUP HEADER 42.7 PROVIDE UNDOABLE TRANSACTION 42.8 USER PROPERTY REVISION 52.9 HELP GUI TO FILTRATE THE UNNECESSARY NOTIFICATIONS 53. ELEMENT EXTENSION 65. Save and put mouse on the text item

Expected Result: Tips should be displayed in the given format

Actual Result: Tips are displayed in one line

MINOR ENHANCEMENTS 32.1 PROVIDE PROPERTY GROUP INFORMATION ON ELEMETNDEFN CLASS 32.2 COMPLETE THE TODO TASKS 32.3 REVIEW RESULT 32.4 MESSAGE FILE ENHANCEMENT 4 CURRENTLY, WE STORE THE ERROR MESSAGE FOR EXCEPTIONS IN THE MESSAGE.PROPERTY FILE. SOME OF THE ERROR MESSAGES ARE DUPLICATE.
OB: When a large content is added to a text item, the tips displayed appear in one line instead of the expected format.
EB: The tips in the text item should be displayed in the given format when large content is added.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Save a large content in the text item.
2. Put the mouse on the text item.
3. Observe that the tips are displayed in one line instead of the expected format.
